name: CyberSnek
description:
Use WASD to play a classic game of modernified snake. By modernified I mean that it has terrible battery life, so stay connected.

Keep your cybersnek connected to build up speed, but don't stay too long or time runs out. The theme for this jam was CONNECTION.

Also, until I finish this game use R to restart.

This game is a submission to the ScoreSpace X Alakajam jam (jam jam?). I'm kind of busy with work but I didn't want to skip the not-work things that make life less dreary so I made something super simple and fast and, hopefully, enjoyable.
